summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2339 for the improvement of Greenwood Avenue, from North Sixty-seventh Street to North Eighty-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by grading, resurfacing and curbing the same, constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden crosswalks thereon and providing for the necessary surface drainage; under Ordinance No. 24280, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
